scripts.release:beta: pnpm run release:pre:beta && pnpm publish --tag beta && pnpm run release:post
scripts.release:post: git add . && git commit -a && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push
scripts.release:pre:beta: git pull && bun ../../scripts/check-beta-version.ts && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && bun ../../scripts/update-exports.ts
scripts.release:pre:stable: git pull && bun ../../scripts/check-stable-version.ts && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && bun ../../scripts/update-exports.ts
scripts.release:stable: pnpm run release:pre:stable && pnpm publish && pnpm run release:post
